lead_paragraph: SHOUKLETOVICH-- Margaret R.,died on Monday, April 25th in her apartment at age 94. She was the daughter of Miles and Matilda Rukavina. She was born in Detroit in 1922 and then Pittsburgh, PA. In 1962, she married Dr. Zivojin Shoukletovich who passed away in 1987. She is survived by two sisters Helen Stofega and Mary Rukavina and seven nieces and nephews and eight grandnieces and nephews. She began her career with United Nations during its first year in Lake Success, NY. She rose from the secretarial pool to high executive position as Director of Administrative Services, from which she retired in 1985. She was an avid reader, patron of the arts, and world traveler. She kept up on current events until her final days. She was a generous friend and devoted to her family. In lieu of flowers, please send donations to The New York Public Library, The Red Cross, UNICEF or The Southern Poverty Law Center. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHOUKLETOVICH, MARGARET R.
